info.name: Wattpad Clean
info.description:
Cleans up the Wattpad reading experience, removing targeted advertisements and most of the community-oriented features.

Feel free to fork from: https://github.com/spncryn/wattpad-clean
info.additionalInfo: I highly recommend pairing this with Wattpad | Flat Black by sinasena: https://userstyles.org/styles/144127/wattpad-flat-black
